products.title: Origin, Matt Red - Venetian Blind
products.metadescription: Origin, matt red - venetian blind brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating
products.productdescription: Brilliantly bold, the origin in matt red will inject life and colour into even the dullest of rooms. The satin-finish slats are made from heavy gauge aluminium, which can be adjusted to your liking using the coordinating cords. You'll love the effect the matt red has on an all-white contemporary kitchen, where it can be beautifully complemented by silver fixtures and fittings such as taps, cupboard handles, and the like. Or insert some colour into a neutral hallway to give guests a warm and memorable welcome.

products.title: Primary Red
products.metadescription: Primary red gloss metal venetian blind

products.title: Ruby Red Aluminium Venetian
products.productdescription: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Rich Red Aluminium Venetian
products.metadescription: The strong colour of the rich red is perfect for anyone looking for a strong statement colour in a room. The matt finish gives this blind a smooth finish and the rich colour is similar to that of a postbox.
products.productdescription: Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more

products.title: Passionate Red (7060)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure passionate red (7060) velux venetian blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux venetian blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment.

 	Perfect for high humidity rooms.
 	Easy to clean.
 	Optimum light adjustment.
 	Preserves your view whole providing privacy.
 	No hanging cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	9 colour choices.
